scripts.build: yarn run build-backend && yarn run build-frontend
scripts.build-backend: cd src/backend && yarn run build && cd ../../ && mkdir dist -p && cp -r ./src/backend/dist/* ./dist
scripts.build-frontend: cd src/frontend && yarn build && cd ../../ && mkdir dist -p && cp -r ./src/frontend/build/ ./dist
scripts.install: yarn run install-frontend && yarn run install-backend
scripts.publish-backend: cd src/backend && yarn run publish && cd ../../ && mkdir dist -p && cp -r ./src/backend/dist/* ./dist
scripts.publish-frontend: cd src/frontend && yarn build && cd ../../ && mkdir dist -p && cp -r ./src/frontend/build ./dist
scripts.publish: yarn run publish-backend && yarn run publish-frontend
scripts.set-docker-vars: yarn config set PACKAGE_VERSION $(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && yarn config set DOCKER_TAG brausen42/alexbrausen.com:v$(yarn config get PACKAGE_VERSION)
scripts.docker-publish: yarn run set-docker-vars && docker build -t $(yarn config get DOCKER_TAG) . && docker push $(yarn config get DOCKER_TAG)
